title: He went to the cupboard
creator_credit: Great Britain. Ministry of Education and Andrew Buchanan
brief_description: A study of pantry lay-out, and the necessity for forethought in planning the use of cupboard space. Married life is subjectively represented through domestic ponderance and male ignorance of the kitchen politic.
creator_credit_for_label: Great Britain. Ministry of Education and Andrew Buchanan
